entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
